body.name: 2-Pack Air Purifiers for Home Large Room Up to 908 Sq Ft Each One, HEPA Air Purifiers for Bedroom with Aromatherapy, HEPA Filter for Smoke, Pet Dander, 99.9% of 0.1 Microns Particles
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 17 hrs 38 mins
features: Enhanced Air Purification: Double-Sided Air Inlets, 2 H13 True HEPA Filters. 3-stage filtration system combines of pre-filter, HEPA filter, and activated carbon filter can remove 99.9% of particles with minimum size of 0.1 microns in the air, such as smoke, pet dander etc, effectively improve air quality of your home.

Maximum Speed Button: Press the Max Speed Mode button, the HEPA air purifier will run at full load, and clean air with the fastest speed. You can also adjust the 4 wind speeds from "Sleep" to "1, 2, 3". Timer setting from 1 to 8 hours, tailor air purification to fit your schedule.

Aromatherapy & Quiet Sleep Mode: Enhance your air purifier with aromatherapy. Add your favorite essential oils for a refreshing and calming atmosphere. Operates quietly for peaceful environments. Sleep mode stays under 25 dB for a serene night.

Save Space yet Powerful: Our home air purifier can cover an area up to 908ft², refreshing the air 5x per hour in rooms as large as 179 ft². 2 air purifiers combined can efficiently cover an area of 1816 ft² per hour. Our Aircillin Air Purifier (6.75 x 6.75 x 10.62 in) is perfect for bedroom, office, kitchen, living room etc.

Official Aircillin H13 HEPA Filters: CARB Certified, FCC Certified, and ETL Listed. Package includes: 2 purifiers, 4 HEPA filters (2 per unit), 2 adapters. Search for B0CMCMDKY1 to find Aircillin replacement filter 4-Pack for AP1501, Search for B0CMCV7JFN to find Aircillin replacement filter 6-Pack for AP1501.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for multi level home
reviews.reviewText: We were dealing with some chronic health issues and decided that getting air purifiers would be a great, non medical way to help deal with the issues. We have seen an overall improvement and the house smells better too. Loved the two pack because we have a two level home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing results on dust and pet odor
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love the size of these things and the portability, mostly like the fact that I have noticed a drastic reduction in dust and in pet odor from my dogs crate they also come with a package of disc so that you can put a fragrance oil in the top of it, also like the fact that you get two of them I use the other one in my bedroom, so that when I sleep, the air is a lot cleaner, I would recommend this to family and I wanted to show pictures because I forgot to mention that in the top you can put a fragrance oil in the little disk, and it will give off a fragrance to the room, and it came with the whole little box of disk, each one has its own little box of disc and these things are simply amazing., they would also be nice to have in every room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these air purifiers. double filters much so much better than our old one did!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Can tell a difference
reviews.reviewText: We can definitely tell a difference when we have these running. We've tried to convinc e ourselves its similar to the "placebo effect", but we have to be honest with ourselves and admit that these are really doing some good for the air in our living room. One day i put them in the kitchen when i deicded to do some deep-frying for dinner. Usually i can't stand the smell of the oil from frying, as it lingers in the house for a day or so. These little things really helped to wipe out the smell by the time i went to bed.The reason for the four stars is because one of them started making a slight rattling sound at lower speeds. Not terrible, but when the house is quiet and i'm sitting and reading, it does become noticeable. I've tried to see what it could be, but haven'e been able to find anything loose.The other one, though, is doing just fine and is quiet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very portable, easy to set up & noticed air difference almost immediately
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this set for our living room and bedroom. During the winter, things start to feel a little stale in our house since we're not opening the windows frequently and I was hopeful that these would help circulate and clean the air to keep things fresh. These are fantastic!-They're small and easy to move. They plug into a traditional outlet but are light and could easily be transferred from room to room based on your needs.-They come with extra aromatherapy pods that can be changed out frequently. We're not currently using this feature but I love that they came with back-up pods so that you have a good stash to begin with.-They circulate air REALLY well! Considering how small these are, they work great! Our living room is about 20x24 and our bedroom is about 16x18, so both are big spaces. These got the air moving almost immediately in both rooms.-They're quiet! I would expect that with as much air as these are moving, they would be noisy but they're not at all. In fact, they're essentially silent. We've kept them set at the 2nd settin (Level 2) and haven't noticed any change in noise in our house.-They're easy to adjust and have 3 settings.-They are well packaged. Instructions are included and easy to follow and they come with 2 of everything.My only concern is finding a filter that works with these since they're a more independent brand but the company reached out after I purchased and before they arrived to let me know that I can order them from them, so I'm resting assured that I'll be able to keep these purifiers going for a long time to come.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent little air purifiers
reviews.reviewText: Decent, small and portable.We got these to use one in the living room and one in the bedroom. They're simple to set up and use, and are small and light so they can fit almost anywhere we need to place it. I think it's hard to really gauge how well something is purifying the air, but we have 3 cats and have seasonal allergies, so hopefully it's doing its job.It is realtively quiet and doesn't bother us when we're sleeping, but we also don't mind a little fan noise at night. Overall I'm happy with them so far. They are simple to use and can be easily moved and placed where you need it. Should any issues arise down the road I'll come back and update this review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great space-saving effective purifiers!
reviews.reviewText: This 2-pack Aircillin air purifiers arrived quickly and packaged superbly well!. Came in a box and it was all wet from the rain, but inside was the original box for the purifiers so it kept everything dry and clean. Was packaged really well.Next we opened it up to see the aromatherapy pads to put essential oils, if you wish to in which I won't be. Then you have the adapter and the booklet.It is very easy to install. You don't even need the booklet for instructions. I looked up the filters for these and they are not inexpensive. However as with all hepa filters, it is the right range.These purifiers have front and back. I really love that. You're really gathering more dust and dander in the air and bringing out fresher air.I really think this is a good deal. These things are not big so it's space saving. Right now they are not in stock. Hope they come back in stock soon so others can order this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Moves a lot of air - a bit loud thou
reviews.reviewText: This filter has inlets on both the front and back with replaceable filter blocks.It moves much more air than I was expecting, but as a result, it is a bit on the loud side.

These were exactly what I was looking for. I have had more expensive air purifiers in the past but had to return them because they sounded like a jet engine when they were on or were not efficient.You get 2 for the price of 1 of the more expensive ones, which is a great deal to start. There are 4 settings (1, 2, 3, H and E(?)). E and 1 are quiet, even quieter than a regular fan where it can't be heard.I have had them running in their respective rooms (living room + bedroom) since I got them and already noticed a significant decrease in dust, and to boot, the added aroma filters at the top (when added to the discs) are better than regular diffusers. The scent is evenly distributed and consistent but not overwhelming.One of the biggest perks is the outlet, its cord faces downwards on the plug so it can be pretty much flesh with furniture if you are putting it there and doesn't protrude like other outlets do.To boot, they are compact, not super tall or thick where it is a hindrance. They are really small and can be easily placed pretty much anywhere without an issue.Overall, highly recommended if looking for an air purifier.

It is very rare to come across a two pack of purifiers that work well and aren't too expensive. These ones do a great job of clearing out dust and allergens (we use it for cats) and are small and unobtrusive, and quiet, but powerful. I like how easy it is to swap filters and that it has intakes on both sides, and blows air up instead of to the side. I'd recommend these in a second!

I've been wanting to have a small, portable air purifier in my home for a while now but had always been put off by the high cost at local big box stores. After some digging, I came across these ones and the value appeared to be high, so I took a chance and have been impressed.I've been using one unit in my office for the last week and have noticed the improved air quality. The different fan levels are great, and the bonus white noise is appreciated. It can be a little loud on the higher setting, but I've got it on the second lowest setting in my office and it's not disruptive.My only concern at this point is the availability of replacement HEPA filters - I see they're available on the .com site, but not currently in stock on .ca, although I will keep an eye.

I'll know in a month how much cat hair and dust these pick up, but I already know they're going to get a lot. There are two big thick filters on each side, and the air that the fan sucks through them is huge even on the lowest, quietest setting.On the lowest setting you can barely hear anything, and I think that's probably enough to do what you need in a regular room. The highest setting sucks and blows some serious air and of course is louder, but still isn't bad at all.They look great, which is a huge bonus. I can tell these are high quality, solid, well built machines and are easy to use and maintain.I'm very glad I bought these, and I expect these will do a lot to help with the endless cat hair and dust.

reviews.reviewTitle: Compact Air purifier with Smoke filter!
reviews.reviewText: We needed an air purifier for two bedrooms so this was ideal. This is a basic air purifier with simple functionalities (speed & timer) with a level display. I found it impressive that this air purifier also has a Carbon filter to remove smoke particles in addition to the H13 HEPA filter. Most Air purifiers with carbon filters cost way more. Level 1 and Sleep mode noise level is quiet, but levels 2 and 3 are significantly loud. You can also use it as an aroma diffuser by adding a few drops of aroma scents to the provided pads. Overall, the build quality is pretty good, it’s fairly compact and light. Do note that each purifier covers 345 sq. ft. The 695 sqft in the description is a combined area when both devices are used in the same space.
